titleInfo.title: Polarised photoelectrons produced at xenon atoms by circularly polarised synchrotron radiation

mods.abstract: Circularly polarised synchrotron radiation is used for producing spin polarised photoelectrons at xenon atoms. After a brief description of the apparatus the dependence of the electron polarisation on the photo energy is presented and compared with a theoretical prediction.

titleInfo.title: Journal of Physics B: Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics
